Title: Saw IV
Writer: Patrick Melton (screenplay), Marcus Dunstan (screenplay), Patrick Melton (story), Marcus Dunstan (story), Thomas Fenton (story)
Actors: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell
Plot: Despite Jigsaw's death, and in order to save the lives of two of his colleagues, Lieutenant Rigg is forced to take part in a new game, which promises to test him to the limit.
